level.heading: Statement of denial.
level.text: A person named in a filed statement of authority granting that person authority may deliver to the Mayor for filing a statement of denial that:
Provides the name of the limited liability company and the caption of the statement of authority to which the statement of denial pertains; and

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For history of Law 18-378, see notes under ยง 29-101.01.

level.heading: Uniform Law:
level.text: This section is based on ยง 303 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act). See Vol. 6B , Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition or ULA Database on Westlaw.
